suit_title: SUIT FOR DISSOLUTION OF MARRIAGE.

prayer:
PRAYER:

In view of the above-mentioned facts and circumstances, it is most respectfully prayed that the titled suit may kindly be decreed in favor of the plaintiff and against the defendant on the following terms:

  • A decree for dissolution of marriage may kindly be passed in favor of the plaintiff and against the defendant with costs.
  • Any other relief which this honorable court deems fit and proper in the circumstances of the case may also be awarded in favor of the plaintiff.
